text: Celebrating another year around the sun for this beauty! HAPPY 90th BIRTHDAY TO MY ABUELITA! This pic was taken pre-pandemic, but I know we’ll be able CELEBRATE soon.  Thankful the #covid19 #vaccine made it so I can at least give her a #birthday hug! #happybirthday #hbd https://t.co/N2Lkw6zXdg
